gw.api.databuilder

Class RIAgreementBuilder<T extends RIAgreement,B extends RIAgreementBuilder<T,B>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.databuilder.DataBuilder<T,B>
      • gw.api.databuilder.CCDataBuilder<T,B>
        • gw.api.databuilder.RIAgreementBuilder<T,B>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ValueGenerator<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NonProportionalRIAgreementBuilder, ProportionalRIAgreementBuilder

    public abstract class RIAgreementBuilder<T extends RIAgreement,B extends RIAgreementBuilder<T,B>>
extends CCDataBuilder<T,B>

    • Constructor Detail

      • RIAgreementBuilder

        public RIAgreementBuilder(IEntityType type)
        Default values:
        • AgreementName: a string containing AgreementNumber
        • AgreementNumber: selected using using a SequentialStringGenerator
        • Active: true
        • AgreementStatus: Active
        • AgreementType: Treaty
        Parameters:
        type - entity type from subtype builder

    • Method Detail

      • withCommonFieldsSet

        protected B withCommonFieldsSet(Currency currency)
        Set common fields to construct a UI ready RIAgreement. To be called from subclasses. The following fields are set:
        • CededShare
        • AttachmentPoint
        • TopOfLayer: a large number, not more than RecoveryLimit
        • RecoveryLimit: a large number
        Parameters:
        currency - the currency for amounts such as attachment point, etc.
        Returns:
        the modified agreement builder

      • common

        public B common(Currency currency)
        Set common fields to construct a common RIAgreement. The following fields are set:
        • TopOfLayer: a large number, not more than RecoveryLimit
        • RecoveryLimit: a large number
        Parameters:
        currency - the currency for amounts such as recovery limit, etc.
        Returns:
        the modified agreement builder

        Returns:

      • onRIAgreementGroup

        public B onRIAgreementGroup(ValueGenerator<? extends RIAgreementGroup> rIAgreementGroupID)
        Sets the associated reinsurance agreement group. Also sets the claim on the agreement to the claim of the agreement group if it has not already been set via onClaim()
        Parameters:
        rIAgreementGroupID - a value generator that will return the desired value
        Returns:
        the modified builder

      • withTopOfLayer

        public B withTopOfLayer(CurrencyAmount topOfLayer)
        Sets the amount at which coverage under this agreement ends. Labeled Coverage Limit in UI.
        Parameters:
        topOfLayer - the desired value
        Returns:
        the modified builder

        Returns:

        Returns:
        RIAgreementBuilder with its claim set
